snippet.title: MediEvil trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for the1998 PSone game MediEvil (taken from UK OPM demo disc no.16vol2).
The game tells the story of the brave knight Sir Daniel Fortesque. One hundred years after his infamous defeat of the evil sorcerer Zarok, Sir Dan is re-born to once more defeat his old foe...
...Well actually one hundred years after sir Dan was killed by the very first arrow fired in the battle against Zarok, his skeleton is accidently revived by Zarok's magic and sets out to live up to his own legend and gain true access to the Hall of Heroes.
Think Tim Burton meets Discworld.
